languages.text: {n}Адальберт хмурится.{/n} "Так ли Ваша Светлость уверена в своих словах? Облегчите душу — я здесь, чтобы помочь вам".
{n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."
languages.original_text: {n}Адальберт хмурится.{/n} "Так ли Ваша Светлость уверена в своих словах? Облегчите душу — я здесь, чтобы помочь вам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul; I am here to help you."

{n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert fronce les sourcils.{/n} « En êtes-vous {mf|certain|certaine}, Votre Seigneurie ? Soulagez votre âme, je suis là pour vous aider. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert fronce les sourcils.{/n} « En êtes-vous {mf|certain|certaine}, Votre Seigneurie ? Soulagez votre âme, je suis là pour vous aider. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert frunce el ceño.{/n} «¿Es eso cierto, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Libere el peso de su alma; estoy aquí para ayudarl{mf|e|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert frunce el ceño.{/n} «¿Es eso cierto, mi{mf|lord|lady}? Libere el peso de su alma; estoy aquí para ayudarl{mf|e|a}».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特皱起了眉头。{/n}“您真的这么认为吗，大人？卸下您灵魂的重担吧，我是来帮您的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特皱起了眉头。{/n}“您真的这么认为吗，大人？卸下您灵魂的重担吧，我是来帮您的。”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは眉をひそめた。{/n}「陛下、本当でしょうか？魂を楽にしてください。あなたを助けるためにここに来たんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは眉をひそめた。{/n}「陛下、本当でしょうか？魂を楽にしてください。あなたを助けるためにここに来たんです」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ist sich Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} da auch ganz sicher? Entlastet Eure Seele. Ich bin hier, um Euch zu helfen."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Ist sich Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} da auch ganz sicher? Entlastet Eure Seele. Ich bin hier, um Euch zu helfen."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri bundan eminler mi? Ruhunuzdaki yükten arının. Size yardımcı olmak için buradayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert frowns.{/n} "Is Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} quite certain of that? Unburden your soul. I am here to help you."
